text: Shonda Rhimes (born January 13, 1970) is an American screenwriter and producer. She is best known for making Grey's Anatomy and Private Practice. Rhimes was born in Chicago, Illinois. Her first book will be published in 2015. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:African-American writers Category:Living people Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: Shonda Rhimes
